channel.title: ukraine on The 5 Day Shenzhen Visa
channel.description: Recent content in ukraine on The 5 Day Shenzhen Visa

item.title: Ukraine – no border Visa for Women!
item.description: An update on my January 2019 post. About: no-female-Ukraine-passport holders: Unfortunately this rule is still valid and enforced (December 2019). Ukrainian women can not get the 5-Day-Shenzhen-Visa at the border. No border Visa for Ukrainian women! User Nicolas had bad luck: Ahhhh. So nice. Why I didn’t find your comment before? Arrived after 22h long trip to HKG airport, went to Huanggang border by shuttle bus, they deny my Ukrainian girlfriend the 5 day Shenzhen visa.

item.title: Ukraine – Men only!
item.description: For Ukraine only men can get the 5-Day-Shenzhen-Visa, women can not!. The charge is RMB 409 (about US$ 60).
